PackageOracle.name: DA_SERVICEABILITY
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_SERVICEABILITY
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.15.914488000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,serviceability_cd IN VARCHAR2
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,serviceability_desc IN VARCHAR2
,servicability_long_desc IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,serviceability_cd IN VARCHAR2
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_serviceability;

body.name: DA_SERVICEABILITY
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_SERVICEABILITY
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.15.924659000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,serviceability_cd IN VARCHAR2
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,serviceability_desc IN VARCHAR2
,servicability_long_desc IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_serviceability.add, parms=' || serviceability_cd || '|' || data_source_type_cd || '|' || serviceability_desc || '|' || servicability_long_desc || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_serviceability a
(
a.serviceability_cd
,a.data_source_type_cd
,a.serviceability_desc
,a.servicability_long_desc
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.serviceability_cd
,add.data_source_type_cd
,add.serviceability_desc
,add.servicability_long_desc
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_serviceability.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,serviceability_cd IN VARCHAR2
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_serviceability.del, parms=' || serviceability_cd || '|' || data_source_type_cd || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_serviceability a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.serviceability_cd = del.serviceability_cd
AND a.data_source_type_cd = del.data_source_type_cd
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_serviceability.del');

END del;

END da_serviceability;
